title: Remove Caffeine/HeartSync footer attribution line

requirements.text: Remove the footer attribution line that reads “© {year} HeartSync. Built with [heart icon] using caffeine.ai” (including the heart icon and the caffeine.ai link) from the app UI footer, while keeping the existing “Created by Angelica Arboleda” footer line.

quotes: puedes quitar esto© 2026 HeartSync. Built with  using caffeine.ai

acceptanceCriteria: Across all app screens that use the shared layout, the footer no longer displays any text similar to “© 2026 HeartSync. Built with … using caffeine.ai”.
The footer no longer renders the caffeine.ai outbound link.
The footer still renders the text “Created by Angelica Arboleda” in the footer.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit files listed in frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Changing any backend behavior or data models.
Changing header branding or the app name.
Adding new footer content beyond removing the requested attribution line.
